summary: An Ordinance accepting a deed from J. W. Clise, Anna H. Clise, his wife; William Nottingham and Eloise H. Nottingham, his wife; Flora B. Smith, widow or Lyman C. Smith, deceased; Burns Lyman Smith, son of Lyman C. Smith, deceased, and Virginia H. Smith, his wife, and Flora Bernice Smith, a minor daughter of Lyman C. Smith, deceased, to lands situate in the S 1/2 of the SE 1/4 of Section 22, Township 25 North, Range 3 East, W. M.
